message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $98?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I need to make a decent profit. I can do $102, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $95?
I'm starting to feel like we're getting close, but I need to make a bit more profit. I can do $99, that's the lowest I can go.
I'm getting close to your price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $96?
I'm not going to go any lower than $98, that's my final offer. If you're interested, let's make a deal.
I'm sorry, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I think we're getting close, but I need to make a final offer of $97. Can you meet me there?
